storyTitle: As Underwriting Analyst, I want to receive automated questions from the rules engine to achieve complete and accurate application data

testCases.title: Validate automated question generation and delivery
preconditions: User has valid Underwriting Analyst credentials
Rules engine is operational and configured with question generation rules
Application submission system is available
Test application data is prepared that triggers question generation
API endpoints POST /api/questions and GET /api/questions/{user} are accessible

steps.action: Submit a test application through the application submission system that meets criteria for triggering question generation from the rules engine
steps.expectedResult: Application is successfully submitted and accepted by the system with confirmation message displayed

steps.action: Verify that the rules engine processes the application and generates relevant questions
steps.expectedResult: System receives questions from rules engine via API within 3 seconds, questions are stored in the database with status 'Pending'

steps.action: Log in as the assigned underwriting analyst and navigate to the question management interface
steps.expectedResult: Analyst successfully logs in and question management interface loads displaying the analyst's dashboard

steps.action: Access the question list for the submitted application
steps.expectedResult: Generated questions are visible in the list with complete details including question text, application reference, priority, and status marked as 'Pending'

steps.action: Verify that questions are actionable by checking for response input fields and submit buttons
steps.expectedResult: Each question displays with input fields appropriate to the question type and an active 'Submit Response' button

steps.action: Enter valid responses for all generated questions and click 'Submit Response' for each question
steps.expectedResult: System accepts the responses, displays success confirmation for each submission, and question status changes from 'Pending' to 'Answered'

steps.action: Navigate to the application details page to verify status update
steps.expectedResult: Application status is updated accordingly based on the submitted responses, reflecting progression in the underwriting workflow (e.g., from 'Awaiting Information' to 'Under Review')

steps.action: Verify that the response data is properly stored and associated with the application
steps.expectedResult: All submitted responses are saved in the system and visible in the application history with timestamp and analyst information

postconditions: Questions are marked as 'Answered' in the system
Application status is updated based on responses
Response data is stored and associated with the application record
Audit trail is created for all question responses

testCases.title: Verify notification alerts for new questions
preconditions: User has valid Underwriting Analyst credentials
Notification system is enabled and configured
Analyst has notification preferences set to receive alerts
Rules engine is operational
Test application data is available to trigger question generation

steps.action: Ensure the analyst is logged into the system with notification alerts enabled
steps.expectedResult: Analyst is successfully logged in and notification icon/panel is visible in the user interface

steps.action: Trigger question generation by submitting an application or using admin tools to generate new questions assigned to the analyst
steps.expectedResult: Questions are successfully generated by the rules engine and assigned to the analyst in the system

steps.action: Observe the notification system for alert delivery
steps.expectedResult: Notification alert is sent and displayed to the analyst within 3 seconds, showing badge count or popup indicating new questions are available

steps.action: Verify the notification content includes relevant information about the new questions
steps.expectedResult: Notification displays the number of new questions, application reference, and priority level with a link to view questions

steps.action: Click on the notification to view the details
steps.expectedResult: System navigates to the question list showing the newly generated questions, notification is marked as 'Read'

steps.action: Check the notification panel or icon to verify the alert status
steps.expectedResult: Notification is cleared or marked as viewed, badge count is decremented, and the notification no longer appears as unread

steps.action: Verify that the notification record is maintained in notification history
steps.expectedResult: Notification appears in the notification history with timestamp, read status, and details of the alert

postconditions: Notification is marked as read/viewed in the system
Notification badge count is updated to reflect viewed status
Notification history contains record of the alert
Analyst has accessed the new questions

storyTitle: As Underwriting Analyst, I want to track the status of automated questions to achieve timely responses and application progression

testCases.title: Verify question status dashboard functionality
preconditions: User has valid Underwriting Analyst credentials
Question tracking database contains test data with questions in various statuses (Pending, Answered, Overdue)
Question status dashboard is accessible
API endpoint GET /api/questions/status is operational
Multiple questions are assigned to the analyst with different priorities and statuses
System time is configured to allow overdue question testing

steps.action: Log in to the system using valid Underwriting Analyst credentials
steps.expectedResult: Analyst successfully authenticates and is redirected to the main dashboard or home page

steps.action: Navigate to the question status dashboard from the main menu or navigation panel
steps.expectedResult: Question status dashboard loads successfully within 1 second displaying the dashboard interface

steps.action: Verify that all assigned questions are displayed with their current status
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard displays a comprehensive list of all questions assigned to the analyst showing question ID, application reference, question text, status (Pending/Answered/Overdue), priority, and timestamp

steps.action: Check that the dashboard shows real-time status information including counts for each status category
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard header or summary section displays accurate counts: total questions, pending questions, answered questions, and overdue questions matching the detailed list

steps.action: Apply a filter to show only 'Pending' status questions using the status filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard refreshes and displays only questions with 'Pending' status, other status questions are hidden, filter indicator shows active filter

steps.action: Clear the status filter and apply a priority filter to show only 'High' priority questions
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard displays only high priority questions regardless of status, questions are filtered correctly based on priority level

steps.action: Apply sorting by clicking on the 'Status' column header
steps.expectedResult: Questions are sorted alphabetically by status (Answered, Overdue, Pending) in ascending order, sort indicator appears on the column header

steps.action: Click the 'Status' column header again to reverse the sort order
steps.expectedResult: Questions are sorted in descending order by status (Pending, Overdue, Answered), sort indicator changes to show descending order

steps.action: Apply sorting by 'Priority' column
steps.expectedResult: Questions are sorted by priority level (High, Medium, Low) with appropriate ordering, maintaining data integrity

steps.action: Combine filters by selecting 'Overdue' status and 'High' priority simultaneously
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard displays only questions that are both overdue AND high priority, showing correct intersection of filter criteria

steps.action: Wait for the scheduled time when an overdue reminder should be triggered (or simulate time passage if testing environment allows)
steps.expectedResult: Automated reminder notification is received for overdue questions via notification system, displaying alert with overdue question details

steps.action: Verify the reminder notification content and delivery method
steps.expectedResult: Reminder includes question details, application reference, days overdue, and priority level; notification appears in notification panel and/or email based on configuration

steps.action: Clear all filters and verify dashboard returns to showing all questions
steps.expectedResult: All assigned questions are displayed again with all statuses and priorities visible, filter indicators are cleared

postconditions: Dashboard displays accurate real-time question status information
All filters and sorting functions are working correctly
Overdue reminder notification has been sent and logged
Question status tracking data remains accurate and unchanged
Analyst session remains active

storyTitle: As Underwriting Analyst, I want to submit responses to automated questions to achieve complete underwriting data and progress applications

testCases.title: Validate question response submission
preconditions: User is logged in as an Underwriting Analyst
Analyst has valid role-based access permissions
At least one question is assigned to the analyst
Application is in a state that allows question responses
Question and response database is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to the assigned questions section from the analyst dashboard
steps.expectedResult: List of assigned questions is displayed with question details and status

steps.action: Select a specific assigned question from the list
steps.expectedResult: Response submission form is displayed with question details, mandatory field indicators, and input fields

steps.action: Enter valid response data in all mandatory fields
steps.expectedResult: Input fields accept the data without validation errors, submit button is enabled

steps.action: Click the submit button to save the response
steps.expectedResult: Response is saved successfully, confirmation message is displayed, and response submission completes within 2 seconds

steps.action: Verify the application status has been updated
steps.expectedResult: Application status reflects the response submission and progresses to the next appropriate stage

steps.action: Navigate to the response history section for the application
steps.expectedResult: Response history page is displayed with all submitted responses

steps.action: Locate the recently submitted response in the history
steps.expectedResult: Submitted response is listed with accurate timestamp, analyst name, question details, and response content

postconditions: Response is permanently saved in the database
Application status is updated to reflect the response submission
Response history contains the new entry with timestamp
Question status is marked as answered
Audit trail is created for the response submission

testCases.title: Verify validation prevents incomplete responses
preconditions: User is logged in as an Underwriting Analyst
Analyst has valid role-based access permissions
At least one question with mandatory fields is assigned to the analyst
Response submission form is accessible
Validation rules are configured for mandatory fields

steps.action: Navigate to the assigned questions section
steps.expectedResult: List of assigned questions is displayed

steps.action: Select a question that has mandatory response fields
steps.expectedResult: Response submission form is displayed with mandatory fields clearly marked with asterisks or indicators

steps.action: Leave one or more mandatory fields empty
steps.expectedResult: Empty mandatory fields are visible and no pre-submission validation errors appear yet

steps.action: Attempt to submit the response with missing mandatory fields
steps.expectedResult: Submission is blocked, validation error messages are displayed next to each empty mandatory field indicating which fields are required

steps.action: Verify that no data is saved to the database
steps.expectedResult: Response is not saved, application status remains unchanged, no entry appears in response history

steps.action: Fill in all mandatory fields with valid data
steps.expectedResult: Validation error messages disappear as fields are completed, submit button becomes fully enabled

steps.action: Submit the response with all mandatory fields completed
steps.expectedResult: Response is successfully saved, confirmation message is displayed, and no validation errors occur

postconditions: Invalid submission attempt is logged but not saved
Application status remains unchanged from incomplete submission attempt
Valid submission after correction is saved successfully
User receives clear feedback about validation requirements
